00030 #include <QtCore>
00031 #include <QtDebug>
00032 
00033 #include "brisacontrolpoint.h"
00034 #include "brisassdpclient.h"
00035 #include "brisamsearchclientcp.h"

00037 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00038 
00039 BrisaControlPoint::BrisaControlPoint(QObject *parent, QString st, int mx) :
00040     QObject(parent) {
00041     this->discoverNetworkAddress();
00042     this->buildUrlBase();
00043     this->deliveryPath = 0;
00044     this->running = false;
00045     this->webserver = new BrisaWebserver(QHostAddress(ipAddress), port);
00046     this->multicastReceiver = new BrisaMulticastEventReceiver(parent);
00047 
00048     /* HTTP protocol implementation for requests */
00049     this->http = new QHttp();
00050 
00051     /* SSDP client */
00052     this->ssdpClient = new BrisaSSDPClient(this);
00053 
00054     /* MSearch client */
00055     msearch = new BrisaMSearchClientCP(this, st, mx);
00056 
00057     /* XML downloader */
00058     downloader = new QNetworkAccessManager();
00059 
00060     webserver->start();
00061 
00062     connect(http, SIGNAL(requestFinished(int, bool)), this, SLOT(httpResponse(int, bool)));
00063     connect(ssdpClient, SIGNAL(removedDeviceEvent(QString)), this, SLOT(deviceRemoved(QString)));
00064     connect(ssdpClient, 
00065             SIGNAL(newDeviceEvent(QString, QString, QString, QString, QString, QString)),
00066             this,
00067             SLOT(deviceFound(QString, QString, QString, QString, QString, QString)));
00068     connect(msearch,
00069             SIGNAL(msearchResponseReceived(QString, QString, QString, QString, QString, QString)),
00070             this,
00071             SLOT(deviceFound(QString, QString, QString, QString, QString, QString)));
00072     connect(downloader, SIGNAL(finished(QNetworkReply*)), this, SLOT(replyFinished(QNetworkReply*)));
00073     connect(this->multicastReceiver, SIGNAL(multicastReceived(QMap<QString,QString>)),
00074             this, SLOT(receiveMulticast(QMap<QString,QString>)));
00075     this->multicastReceiver->start();
00076 }
00077 
00078 BrisaControlPoint::~BrisaControlPoint() {
00079     if (!isRunning())
00080         this->stop();
00081 
00082     delete this->downloader;
00083     delete this->msearch;
00084     delete this->ssdpClient;
00085     delete this->webserver;
00086     delete this->http;
00087     delete this->multicastReceiver;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void BrisaControlPoint::start() {
00091     if (isRunning()) {
00092         qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: already started.";
00093     } else {
00094         this->ssdpClient->start();
00095         this->msearch->start();
00096         this->running = true;
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void BrisaControlPoint::stop() {
00101     if (!isRunning()) {
00102         qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: already stopped.";
00103     } else {
00104         this->ssdpClient->stop();
00105         this->msearch->stop();
00106         this->running = false;
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 bool BrisaControlPoint::isRunning() {
00111     return this->running;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void BrisaControlPoint::discover() {
00115     this->msearch->discover();
00116 }
00117 
00118 void BrisaControlPoint::replyFinished(QNetworkReply *reply) {
00119     QTemporaryFile *rootXml = new QTemporaryFile();
00120     if (!rootXml->open()) {
00121         qWarning() << "Brisa Control Point: Failed to open file for writing root XML.";
00122     } else {
00123         rootXml->write(reply->readAll());
00124         rootXml->seek(0);
00125         QUrl *urlBase = new QUrl(reply->url());
00126 
00127         BrisaControlPointDevice *device = new BrisaControlPointDevice(rootXml, urlBase);
00128 
00129         /* Fix embedded devices host/port attributes */
00130         QList<BrisaControlPointService*> serviceList = device->getServiceList();
00131         foreach(BrisaControlPointService *s, serviceList) {
00132                 s->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::Host, urlBase->host());
00133                 s->setAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::Port,
00134                         QString().setNum(urlBase->port()));
00135         }
00136 
00137         rootXml->remove();
00138         delete rootXml;
00139         delete urlBase;
00140         // deleteLater as per Qt documentation (see Detailed Description section of
00141         // QNetworkAccessManager class documentation for more details;
00142         reply->deleteLater();
00143 
00144         emit deviceFound(device);
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 void BrisaControlPoint::deviceFound(QString, QString location, QString,
00149                                     QString, QString, QString) {
00150     downloader->get(QNetworkRequest(QUrl(location)));
00151 }
00152 
00153 void BrisaControlPoint::deviceRemoved(const QString udn) {
00154     emit deviceGone(udn);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void BrisaControlPoint::buildUrlBase() {
00158     QString sPort;
00159     sPort.setNum(this->port);
00160     this->urlBase = "http://" + ipAddress + ":" + sPort;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void BrisaControlPoint::discoverNetworkAddress() {
00164     this->port = getPort();
00165     this->ipAddress = getValidIP();
00166     qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: Acquired Address " << this->ipAddress
00167             << ":" << this->port;
00168 }
00169 
00170 BrisaEventProxy *BrisaControlPoint::getSubscriptionProxy(BrisaControlPointService *service) {
00171     deliveryPath++;
00172     BrisaEventProxy *subscription = new BrisaEventProxy(
00173                                             QStringList(this->urlBase),
00174                                             webserver,
00175                                             deliveryPath,
00176                                             service->getAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::Host),
00177                                             service->getAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::Port).toInt(),
00178                                             http,
00179                                             service->getAttribute(BrisaControlPointService::EventSubUrl));
00180 
00181     requests[deliveryPath] = subscription;
00182     return subscription;
00183 }
00184 
00185 void BrisaControlPoint::httpResponse(int i, bool error) {
00186     qWarning() << "Brisa Control Point: Http response for request " << i;
00187 
00188     // Locate request object
00189     BrisaEventProxy *subscription = NULL;
00190 
00191     foreach(int deliveryPath, requests.keys()) {
00192         if (requests[deliveryPath]->requestId == i) {
00193             subscription = requests[deliveryPath];
00194             qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: Response for request id " << i << " " << deliveryPath;
00195             break;
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     if (!subscription) {
00200         qWarning() << "Brisa Control Point: Failed to match response with request id " << i;
00201         return;
00202     } else if (error) {
00203         // TODO forward error to user, notify that subscription didn't work
00204         qWarning() << "Brisa Control Point: Subscription error "  << http->errorString() << i;
00205         return;
00206     }
00207 
00208     QHttpResponseHeader header = http->lastResponse();
00209     QString sid = header.value("SID");
00210 
00211     if (sid.isEmpty()) {
00212         // Try "sid"
00213         sid = header.value("sid");
00214     }
00215 
00216     if (sid.isEmpty()) {
00217         // TODO report subscription error to user
00218         qWarning() << "Brisa Control Point: SID header not present on event subscription response.";
00219         foreach(QString key, header.keys()) {
00220             qDebug() << key << header.value(key);
00221         }
00222 
00223         qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: Finished printing headers.. printing data" << http->readAll();
00224 
00225         return;
00226     }
00227 
00228     subscription->setSid(sid);
00229     qDebug() << "Brisa Control Point: Subscribed with SID " << subscription->getSid();
00230 }
00231 
00232 void BrisaControlPoint::receiveMulticast(BrisaOutArgument attributes)
00233 {
00234     emit multicastReceived(attributes.value("variableName"), attributes.value("newValue"));
00235     emit multicastReceivedRaw(attributes);
00236 }
